column1: (a)    The  Department  of  Census  and  Statistics  (DCS)  commenced  publishing  the  CCPI  with  the  new  base  year,

column2: 2021=100, from the data release of February 2023 and discontinued the publication of the CCPI with the old

base year, 2013=100. Accordingly, data commencing January 2023 in the chart are based on the series with 
the new base year, 2021=100.
